body: @DecimQuin: Mash is the obligatory Servant everyone gets at the start of the game. So she's pretty much around us at all times. There's only some occasional events and main story chapters, where she's kinda getting removed from the picture, because she had to stay at home and the communication devices don't work. In those cases, Servants like Meltryllis, Okita Alter and Musashi got the main heroine spotlight.
Double censor kinda ruins it but at least its not lightsaber censored

@DecimQuim apparently Mashu cock blocks the MC often in the game or something whenever the MC is about to get laid, I don’t remember her doing that but everyone else does, better to ask some other FGO players
Why does Mashu get shit on so badly in these type of doujins I'll never understand, and she even gets called "Cuck Queen" by fgo players
